data.englishTranslation: O Allah, bless our fruit for us, bless our town for us, bless our Sa' for us and bless our Mudd for us. (Sa' and Mudd are both dry measures used for agricultural produce by the Arabs in the Prophet's time.)
data.transliteration: Allahumma baarik lanaa fee thamarinaa, wa baarik lanaa fee madeenatinaa, wa baarik lanaa fee saa'inaa, wa baarik lanaa fee muddinaa.
data.arabicVerse: اللّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِي ثَمَرِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مَدِينَتِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي صَاعِنَا، وَبَارِكْ لَنَا فِي مُدِّنَا
